featured.text: Only a few centimeters in length, the fish breed easily in captivity, grow quickly, and their transparent body makes it easy to study their organs.

definition.zh_def: 公分，長度單位，等於一米的百分之一。
definition.en_def: A unit of length in the metric system, equal to one hundredth of a meter.
definition.example: The book is about twenty centimeters long.
